matrix.vui
Interface DragAndDropFrame

All Known Implementing Classes:
MxFrame
public interface DragAndDropFrame

Frames that want to support drag and drop must implement this interface.

Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0

Method Summary
 DragAndDropTarget findTarget(java.awt.Point position, DragAndDropSource source)
          If the specified point is over a target which can accept the dragged object, then return that target, otherwise return null.
 java.awt.Frame getFrame()
          Get the frame for this drag and drop frame
 boolean inside(java.awt.Point position)
          Test if position is inside the frame
 void registerDragAndDropTarget(DragAndDropTarget target)
          Register a drag and drop target.
 void unregisterDragAndDropTarget(DragAndDropTarget target)
          Unregister a drag and drop target.

findTarget

public DragAndDropTarget findTarget(java.awt.Point position,
                                    DragAndDropSource source)
If the specified point is over a target which can accept the dragged object, then return that target, otherwise return null.
Parameters:
position - position of the mouse in screen coordinates
source - the object being dragged
Returns:
the accepting target, otherwise null
Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0

inside

public boolean inside(java.awt.Point position)
Test if position is inside the frame
Parameters:
position - position of the mouse in screen coordinates
Returns:
true if position is inside the frame
Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0
